pageContext.claim: “We've really strengthened up the borders, as you know, and if we had some help from them, we need some votes to get rid of loopholes. They have loopholes. They call loopholes. Democrats want to give welfare and free health care to illegal aliens, courtesy of you, the American taxpayer and the African-American community.”
pageContext.analysis: Five Democratic candidates either don’t support providing covering undocumented immigrants under a government health plan or have not responded to the question.
